description.intro_text: The high performance flooring solution with the well known marble design based on 98% prirodni sastojci !
description.full_text:
Dizajn i proizvod
98% prirodni sastojci: svetle i blistave boje
Ugrađeni dizajni: dugotrajan izgled
Neocare surface treatment: mat efekat
Kreativni dizajn: mermer šara
Ugradnja i održavanje
Neocare surface treatment: jednostavno održavanje and niska ukupna cena vlasništva
Fleksibilan proizvod: jednostavno za sečenje i ugradnju
Primena
High abrasion and scratch resisance: ideal for high trafic application ( education, healthcare,...)
Odlična antivirusna i antibakterijska svojstva: pogodno za zdravstvene ustanove
Održivost
98% natural (bio based & mineral) ingredients: organski podovi
76% brzo obnovljivi sastojci: očuvanje resursa
TVOC after 28 days <10 micrograms/m3: vrlo dobar kvalitet unutrašnjeg vazduha
Up to 40% recycled content/100% reciklabilno: očuvanje resursa
Proizvedeno u Nemačkoj: smanjen CO2 otisak transporta
CO2 neutralno od proizvodnje do isporuke
Cradle to Cradle Silver sertifikat sertifikat

Product & Design: 98% natural ingredients: bright & sparkling colours
Inlaid designs: long lasting aspect
Neocare surface treatment: matt effect
Creative Design: marble pattern
Neocare surface treatment: easy maintenance and low total cost of ownership
Flexible product: easy to cut and to install
High abrasion and scratch resisance: ideal for high trafic application ( education, healthcare,...)
Excellent antiviral and antibacterial comportment: suitable for healthcare application
98% natural (bio based & mineral) ingredients: organic flooring solution
76% rapidly renewable ingredients: preservation of resources
TVOC after 28 days <10 micrograms/m3: very good indoor air quality
Up to 40% recycled content/100% recyclable: preservation of resources
Made in Germany: reduced CO2 footprint of transport
CO2 neutral from cradle to gate
Cradle to Cradle Silver

Inlaid designs: long lasting aspect
Neocare surface treatment: matt effect
Creative Design: marble pattern
Neocare surface treatment: easy maintenance and low total cost of ownership
Flexible product: easy to cut and to install
High abrasion and scratch resisance: ideal for high trafic application ( education, healthcare,...)
Excellent antiviral and antibacterial comportment: suitable for healthcare application
98% natural (bio based & mineral) ingredients: organic flooring solution
76% rapidly renewable ingredients: preservation of resources
TVOC after 28 days <10 micrograms/m3: very good indoor air quality
Up to 40% recycled content/100% recyclable: preservation of resources
Made in Germany: reduced CO2 footprint of transport
CO2 neutral from cradle to gate

description.intro_text: The high performance flooring solution with the well known marble design based on 98% prirodni sastojci !
description.full_text:
Dizajn i proizvod
98% prirodni sastojci: svetle i blistave boje
Ugrađeni dizajni: dugotrajan izgled
Neocare surface treatment: mat efekat
Kreativni dizajn: mermer šara
Ugradnja i održavanje
Neocare surface treatment: jednostavno održavanje and niska ukupna cena vlasništva
Fleksibilan proizvod: jednostavno za sečenje i ugradnju
Primena
High abrasion and scratch resisance: ideal for high trafic application ( education, healthcare,...)
Odlična antivirusna i antibakterijska svojstva: pogodno za zdravstvene ustanove
Održivost
98% natural (bio based & mineral) ingredients: organski podovi
76% brzo obnovljivi sastojci: očuvanje resursa
TVOC after 28 days <10 micrograms/m3: vrlo dobar kvalitet unutrašnjeg vazduha
Up to 40% recycled content/100% reciklabilno: očuvanje resursa
Proizvedeno u Nemačkoj: smanjen CO2 otisak transporta
CO2 neutralno od proizvodnje do isporuke
Cradle to Cradle Silver sertifikat sertifikat
